name: grid-js-component
description: A reactjs and vuejs grid component.

scripts.build: npm run file2variable && npm run build-ts && npm run build-less && webpack --config demo/webpack.config.js && npm run clean-rev && rev-static --config demo/rev-static.config.js
scripts.build-ts: npm run clean && tsc -p src && tsc -p demo
scripts.build-less: lessc src/grid.less > dist/grid.css && lessc demo/common.less > demo/common.css && npm run cleancss
scripts.cleancss: cleancss -o dist/grid.min.css dist/grid.css ./node_modules/perfect-scrollbar/dist/css/perfect-scrollbar.css && cleancss -o demo/index.bundle.css dist/grid.min.css ./node_modules/github-fork-ribbon-css/gh-fork-ribbon.css demo/common.css

author: York Yao
